attributes.action: Abandon the new age of 12 for parents to recieve benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As you may know there is large amounts of discussion going around about child benefits. The age is considdering going down from 16 to 12 years.
You will stop receiving benefits when your child turns 12. This is'nt fair is it?
To get money you will have to go to work as soon as they turn this new age. You could have your kids coming home on their own. Or having to go to a child minders, more money out of your pocket.
